title: Vase
marks:
Inscription

on bottom, in blue: six characters
description: columnar vessel with outward-flaring, trumpet-shaped mouth; slightly outward-flaring foot; raised rib at center of column; rose colored mottled glaze over very pale blue; some green and khaki colored mottled spots on column
creditline: Given in memory of Byron H. and Doreen R. McKinney
